org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.writer

类 RoundRobinChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.writer.RoundRobinChannelSelector<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of record which is sent through the attached output gate
    所有已实现的接口:
    ChannelSelector<T>

    public class RoundRobinChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChannelSelector<T>
    This is the default implementation of the ChannelSelector interface. It represents a simple round-robin strategy, i.e. regardless of the record every attached exactly one output channel is selected at a time.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private int[] nextChannelToSendTo
      Stores the index of the channel to send the next record to.

      Constructs a new default channel selector.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int[] selectChannels(T record, int numberOfOutputChannels)
      Returns the logical channel indexes, to which the given record should be written.

    • 方法详细资料

      • selectChannels

        public int[] selectChannels(T record,
                            int numberOfOutputChannels)
        从接口复制的说明: ChannelSelector
        Returns the logical channel indexes, to which the given record should be written.
        指定者:
        selectChannels 在接口中 ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
        参数:
        record - the record to the determine the output channels for
        numberOfOutputChannels - the total number of output channels which are attached to respective output gate
        返回:
        a (possibly empty) array of integer numbers which indicate the indices of the output channels through which the record shall be forwarded
